body:
Listed French artist Louis-Robert de Cuvillon's watercolors are very subtle and delicate.  Many of his passionate works such as "Women with a Tambourine", "Women in Exotic Dress", and "Girl with a Fan" have been sold through such venues as Sotheby's New York and Bonhams Los Angeles.

Hï»¿igh auction record for this artist: $3,227.

title: Catching Butterflies
